name: Pong
body:
### Welcome to my firt hand made game :D.
Hello, this is my firt game made with manual coding. Its programmed in the programming langiage Haxe/OpenFL.
This is a very simple graphics game to play a kind of tennis with a bot.
Controls:
- Space - to start
- Arrow up - move your platform up
- Arrow down - move your platform down

### Downloads
Windows(V1.0):

https://www.dropbox.com/s/rpdgm0sidbb57sx/Windows.zip?dl=0

Mac(V1.0):

https://www.dropbox.com/s/3j6gykan4l8lycr/Mac.zip?dl=0

Linux(V1.0):

https://www.dropbox.com/s/rhkr3p7zteq1dyj/Linux.zip?dl=0
